items.title: Grok is undressing anyone, including minors

Not only does the original poster not get notified if their picturâ€¦

items.title: 'I will leave one day' - Guardiola on City future
items.summary: Manchester City head coach Pep Guardiola has insisted he wants to "fight with his team" and see out his contract at the club, following reported interest in former Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca.
